Trade/Device Name(s): FreeStyle Lite Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Specimen Container(s): FreeStyle Lite Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FreeStyle Lite Blood Glucose Monitoring System using coulometric biosensor technology for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by people with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor diabetes control by quantitatively measuring glucose in fresh whole blood from finger, upper arm, and palm; not for diagnosis or neonatal use; single-user only.
